featured.text: In 1498, Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama made the first sea voyage to India, via the southernmost tip of Africa.

definition.zh_def: 瓦斯科，一個常見的男性名字，源自於西班牙和葡萄牙。
definition.en_def: Vasco is a common male name of Spanish and Portuguese origin.
definition.example: Vasco is planning to travel to Portugal next summer.
